qa_list.question: How does the Cookie Policy allow users to control their data?
qa_list.answer: The Cookie Policy allows users to control their data by providing options such as accepting or rejecting cookies and deleting existing ones.

qa_list.question: What is the main difference between Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy according to this document?
qa_list.answer: According to this document, the main difference between Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy is that Privacy Policy focuses on protecting user information while Cookie Policy deals with cookies.

qa_list.question: What does 'third parties' mean in the context of the Privacy Policy?
qa_list.answer: In the context of the Privacy Policy, third parties refer to entities outside of the website or service that may receive user information.

The Carnegie Mellon Portugal Program is an international partnership with the mission to place Portugal at the forefront of innovation in key focused areas of Information and Communication Technologies (ICT).

FCT International Partnerships: 2023 Overview Video

The

three “FCT International Partnerships”,

CMU Portugal, MIT Portugal and UT Austin Portugal hosted a joint Session at Encontro Ciência 2023 Summit to discuss the impact of the FCT GO Portugal International partnerships.

Together, they have prepared an

overview video with a glimpse of their contribution and key outcomes to foster science, research and education, in almost two decades of activity.

Watch it now!
